channel.title: Need help with client downloads
channel.description: every time i download someone client to play their server i download it the i open it and click run.bat but the cmd pops up and immedietly closes how do i fix this so i can pull up their client and play their server thanx for help

item.title: Need help with client downloads
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

If Jacob’s solution doesn’t work, right click run.bat and select Edit. This will now open a notepad document and Im guessing it will look something like this…

@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Now there are two ways to fix this.

Example 1.

Change it to this:

@echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

Example 2.

Open My Computer, or Computer for Vista and follow this.

C:\Program Files\Java#Your JRE#\bin

Now inside this folder you will find a program called, Java.exe go ahead and copy this, (Right click, Copy)

Now paste it in with the rest of the client files. Now try run it again.

If either of these don’t work, Pm me and i will show you a third way.

MasterofPK

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with client downloads
item.dc:creator: @JacobRSC JacobRSC
item.description:
@JacobRSC wrote:

This is probably and most likely happening because you don’t have the Latest Java or you just don’t have Java installed on your computer at all.
Go to Java.com and Install Java, if this doesn’t work post feedback and please be more specific.

Read full topic
